name: xfunddex
description: XFundDex - Twitter-controlled Solana crowdfunding for DEXScreener updates

scripts.postinstall: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && BACKEND_PORT=8080 npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
